thread.title: Watching Random Things Get Done to This CGI Human Head Gets Really Weird Really Quickly
thread.title_full: Watching Random Things Get Done to This CGI Human Head Gets Really Weird Really Quickly

author: Casey Chan on Sploid, shared by Casey Chan to Gizmodo
title: Watching Random Things Get Done to This CGI Human Head Gets Really Weird Really Quickly
text:
Go to permalink GIF 
I can’t even begin to explain what the hell is going on in this clip made by Steve Smith and Jerry Paper for Adult Swim because holy mother it gets freaking weird. All I can tell you is that there’s a digital human head (or at least, like, the skin, eyeballs, and teeth of a human head) being put through tests that just get more wild as it goes on. Advertisement 
A fan blows the head apart, it gets dunked in green goo, tagged with lasers, punched, stamped, shot, spray painted, deformed, and just generally messed with in every way possible. I can’t tell if I’m laughing because it’s so absurd, or because I’m nervous, or because there’s nothing else you can do when you see a fake human head get wrecked like this.
